parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Format "Authorization Bearer <<OAuth Token>>"

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Request message format as application/json or application/xml (default assumed application/json)

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Content-Types that are acceptable including application/json or application/xml (default assumed application/json)

parameters.name: x-sessionid
parameters.description: Long lasting correlation ID. Consumer provided.

parameters.name: x-interactionid
parameters.description: Alphanumeric value represent a common transaction id across all calls made from UI, while completing all business activity needs of a particular customer.

parameters.name: x-timestamp
parameters.description: A timestamp provided by sender to track their workflow. If it is empty APIGEE uses current system timestamp on server.

parameters.name: x-storeid
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the retail store location. Mandatory for FullService  (Tmobile RETAIL channel). Need to discuss with T-Mobile business liaison if there is a need for Partner to pass their retail Store Id).

parameters.name: x-activityid
parameters.description: Unique id alphanumeric value generated and sent by the partner to identify every the service request uniquely.

parameters.name: creditLevel
parameters.description: creditLevel

parameters.description: Request message format as application/json or application/xml (default assumed application/json)

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Content-Types that are acceptable including application/json or application/xml (default assumed application/json)

parameters.name: x-sessionid
parameters.description: Long lasting correlation ID. Consumer provided.

parameters.name: x-interactionid
parameters.description: Alphanumeric value represent a common transaction id across all calls made from UI, while completing all business activity needs of a particular customer.

parameters.name: x-timestamp
parameters.description: A timestamp provided by sender to track their workflow. If it is empty APIGEE uses current system timestamp on server.

parameters.name: x-storeid
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the retail store location. Mandatory for FullService  (Tmobile RETAIL channel). Need to discuss with T-Mobile business liaison if there is a need for Partner to pass their retail Store Id).

parameters.name: x-activityid
parameters.description: Unique id alphanumeric value generated and sent by the partner to identify every the service request uniquely.

parameters.name: cartID
parameters.description: Cart ID

parameters.name: planConfigID
parameters.description: EP Plan Config ID

parameters.name: creditLevel
parameters.description: creditLevel

parameters.name: selectedPlanID
parameters.description: Selected Plan in UI

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Format "Authorization Bearer <<OAuth Token>>"

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Request message format as application/json or application/xml (default assumed application/json)

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Content-Types that are acceptable including application/json or application/xml (default assumed application/json)

parameters.name: x-sessionid
parameters.description: Long lasting correlation ID. Consumer provided.

parameters.name: x-interactionid
parameters.description: Alphanumeric value represent a common transaction id across all calls made from UI, while completing all business activity needs of a particular customer.

parameters.name: x-timestamp
parameters.description: A timestamp provided by sender to track their workflow. If it is empty APIGEE uses current system timestamp on server.

parameters.name: x-storeid
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the retail store location. Mandatory for FullService  (Tmobile RETAIL channel). Need to discuss with T-Mobile business liaison if there is a need for Partner to pass their retail Store Id).

parameters.name: x-activityid
parameters.description: Unique id alphanumeric value generated and sent by the partner to identify every the service request uniquely.

parameters.name: cartID
parameters.description: Cart ID

parameters.name: creditLevel
parameters.description: creditLevel

parameters.name: planConfigID
parameters.description: EP Plan Config ID

quantity.description: no. of accessory to be added

accessoriesEipEligible.description: If true then,the accessory is eligible for EIP

subType.description: Line type - it can be either HANSET / TABLET
Line type - it can be either HANSET / TABLET

planOptionSelectorID.description: Id of the plan to be selected

pageCount.description: Total pages based on per page record count

premiumFee.description: Purchase price of all the devices having price list premium fee

clubFee.description: Purchase price of all the devices having price list club fee

availableFromDate.description: The availability start date for the product if it is currently not available.

dataSize.description: This attribute is applicable only for plan

dataServiceSoc.description: This attribute is applicable only for plan

ratePlanSoc.description: This attribute is applicable only for plan

availableToDate.description: The availability end date for the product if it is currently not available.

id.description: Id of the item. It can be lineId/Device Id/Service Id/accessory Id/plan Id

clubTier.description: The device tier for club  pricing

taxInclusive.description: Identifies if the tax is included in the pricing

productSubType.description: The product subtype such as Handset/Tablet/Simcard

productType.description: Type of the product, It can be either Device/Accessory

planconfigurationsID.description: Plan config Id of the cart

quantity.description: Number of accessory to be added
